name: ExcuseGenerator
0:
”Alexa, tell Excuse Generator to get me an excuse for work”
”Alexa, open Excuse Generator and new excuse for prom”
”Alexa, ask Excuse Generator new excuse for church”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: excuse generator
des: Have you ever wanted to come up with an excuse for school, or work, or a social event? Only to find out that you couldn't come up with anything believable? Worry no more. The Excuse Generator has you covered.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
